t: And*p He said to me, “Son of man, stand on your feet, and I will speak to you.”
Then the Spirit entered me when He spoke to me, and set me on my feet; and I heard Him who spoke to me.
And He said to me: “Son of man, I am sending you to the children of Israel, to a rebellious nation that has rebelled against Me; they and their fathers have transgressed against Me to this very day.
For they*i are*i impudent and stubborn children. I am sending you to them, and you shall say to them, ‘Thus says the Lord God.’*s
As for them, whether they hear or whether they refuse—for they are*i a rebellious house—yet they will know that a prophet has been among them.

“And*p you, son of man, do not be afraid of them nor be afraid of their words, though briers and thorns are*i with you and you dwell among scorpions; do not be afraid of their words or dismayed by their looks, though they are*i a rebellious house.
You shall speak My words to them, whether they hear or whether they refuse, for they are*i rebellious.
But you, son of man, hear what I say to you. Do not be rebellious like that rebellious house; open your mouth and eat what I give you.”
Now*p when I looked, there was a hand stretched out to me; and behold, a scroll of a book was*i in it.
Then He spread it before me; and there*i was*i writing on the inside and on the outside, and written on it were*i lamentations and mourning and woe.
